MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  ML11 postcode area of Lanark, affecting properties in Bannatyne Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:07pm. Our engineers are on their way to site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:15pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:26pm on the 16th of March 2021
